messages.subject: the school wants more!
messages.msgSnippet: Today I informed the school, in writing, that Jack would not be back next fall. The principal called me and asked for a more detailed account as to why Jack
messages.messageBody:
Today I informed the school, in writing, that Jack would not be back
next fall. The principal called me and asked for a more detailed
account as to why Jack wouldn't be back. I told her this wasn't
required by Kansas law, but she requested again (nicely) that, would
I please give her more of a reason than "Jack won't be back next
year." I was wondering if Sandra (or anyone) would allow me to email
off list a copy of the letter I wrote this afternoon, and critique it
for me?
~Nancy
